text.__SUMMARY__: Brickellia cavanillesii is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is widespread across much of Mexico from Chiapas north as far as Durango.The species is named for Spanish botanist Antonio José Cavanilles 1745 – 1804.
